name: Pumpkin Crisp
ingredients: 18.25 oz. butter flavored yellow cake mix
instructions: Pour into lightly greased 9 x 13 pan.
Sprinkle cake mix evenly over pumpkin mix; sprinkle evenly with pecans.
Bake at 350 for 1 hour to 1 hour and 5 minutes or until golden brown.
Remove from oven and let stand 10 minutes before serving.
Serve warm or at room temperature with whip cream.
